resources.string:
This is an OTT (over-the-top) video search app developed by Team 15.
If you find any invalid links or no results for your search,
please send us an email through "ISSUE REPORT".
Thank you for using our app.

"Search"
You can search the platform of the video you want to watch
You can see the platform icon on the left.
Find the video you want to watch and click on the link.
Click on the link to link directly to the video page for watching.
(Chinese keywords are recommended)
Inside
"Scrape Online" for scraping data to database
If the data you want is not in the database
You can toggle the option to search
Warning:
There may be a delay of 20 seconds to 100 seconds
"Hit"
allows you to select the desired platform
Provides you with recommended top videos.
Please search by the full title if possible,\notherwise it may not load properly.

When "Scrape Online" is enabled,
the search may time out.
If there is no response for more than 1 minute,
please kill the app and restart it.
Error: Network problem or connection timeout\nYou can turn off \"Scrape Online\" and try again.
Do you want open email app to report?
